articles.description: Great Britain's Matthew Hudson-Smith misses out on Olympic 400m gold by four-hundredths of a second in a dramatic finish at Paris 2024.
articles.title: Matthew Hudson-Smith takes 400m silver at Paris 2024 behind Quincy Hall

articles.description: Great Britain win silver in the men's team pursuit to secure a third medal in as many days in the Paris Olympic velodrome.
articles.title: Olympics track cycling: Great Britain win men's team pursuit silver

articles.description: Your day-by-day guide to what is happening when - and who to watch out for - at the Paris 2024 Olympics.
articles.title: Olympics schedule & day-by-day guide to key events & British medal hopes at Paris 2024

articles.description: Find out the medal table from the Paris Olympics 2024, including overall medals, gold medals, silver medals and bronze medals for Team GB and other countries.
articles.title: Olympic Medal Table - Paris 2024 gold, silver & bronze tally

articles.description: American Noah Lyles will have the chance to become the first man since Usain Bolt to complete an Olympic sprint double after qualifying for the 200m final at Paris 2024.
articles.title: Paris 2024 Olympics: Noah Lyles sets up shot at Olympic sprint double

articles.description: Lin Yu-ting secures a place in the Olympic women's featherweight final amid the ongoing controversy over her eligibility.
articles.title: Olympic boxing: Lin Yu-ting secures place in gold-medal bout

articles.description: A member of Australia's hockey team is arrested in Paris and is in custody for allegedly buying cocaine.
articles.title: Paris 2024: Australia hockey player arrested for allegedly buying cocaine

articles.description: Rafael Nadal pulls out of this month's US Open, saying he would not "be able to give my 100% at this time".
articles.title: Rafael Nadal pulls out of US Open saying he is 'not 100%'

articles.description: Greek pole vaulter Eleni-Klaoudia Polak is provisionally suspended from the Paris Olympics after failing a doping test, the International Olympic Committee says.
articles.title: Paris Olympics 2024: Greek Pole vaulter Eleni-Klaoudia Polak provisionally suspended for doping

articles.description: BBC Sport followed Lee Carsley's England U21 team as they won the 2023 European Championships and explain his brand of football.
articles.title: Lee Carsley: England's likely interim manager plays brand of football dubbed 'Carsball'
